name: Grapefruit, Lime, and Tequila (Paloma) Sorbet
description: Tart and sweet with a tequila kick: the classic Mexican cocktail in sorbet form.
recipeIngredient: 2 1/4 cup strained grapefruit juice from 4 large grapefruit
1/2 cup fresh juice and 2 teaspoons grated zest from 6 to 8 limes
1/4 teaspoon ground chili flakes (such as aleppo)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together all ingredients until sugar is dissolved. Chill mixture in refrigerator until very cold, about 3 hours, then strain into ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions. Chill in freezer for at least 4 hours before serving.
